desc:
Please can I have something similar to the below table for the judgment file for Compuscan?

idNo      varchar(20)
firstName            varchar(255)
lastName             varchar(255)
postalAddress   varchar(800)
residentialAddress          varchar(800)
employerName                varchar(255)
homeTel              varchar(30)
workTel                varchar(30)
cellTel   varchar(30)
administrator     varchar(255)
applicationDate                date
courtPlace           varchar(30)
caseNo varchar(20)
courtDate            date
amount                decimal(10, 2)
unique_ref         varchar(30)
name: CW - CCW258 - Compuscan
